CatDescriptText: Ewari (Ed) Ellis was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Out column published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1970, pg. 4 with question: "What do you think of County Commissioners Staisey and Forester's recent appointment of Jim Slusser as Director of the Police Academy?" Answer reads: "If you're asking me that as a black man and as far as black people are concerned, the decisions he made in past concerning black officers and in view of the need for black policemen, I don't think he's qualified.  His northern racist policies and his general attitude in the way he conducts his business makes him unqualified."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Ewari (Ed) Ellis wearing an African-style carved head pendant, beard, and eyeglasses, standing in front of doorway, Hill District
